story:
WE ARE DEAD AND ALIVE!

Hell yeah! After a long journey our new record DEAD AND ALIVE is finally getting ready and over the last months we've been pushing boundaries to get this done. And as with TIME TEARS DOWN we followed our own path to get the challenge of an album production done.



However PARASITE INC. has grown and with the new record we are facing a completely new level of financial concessions that we just can't manage all on our own anymore. So we need your help to deliver you DEAD AND ALIVE in the best way possible!
 

MATH AND MONEY 

So we did some math to break down the cost of the entire production and ended up with a minimum goal of 10.000€ to cover the cost of the production and to deliver an adequate experience:

  • 1500€ pressing CDs
    ...incl. a limited campaign only slipcase.
     
  • 1500€ merchandise 
    ...for the shirts and other merchandise that will come exclusively with this campaign.
     
  • 2000€ recording and mixing
    We invested a lot of money into our own studio equipment over the last years, which in the long run ist much more cost-saving than spending money for external recording studios and hopefully allows us to produce new albums way faster in the future.
    Be assured, that we only try to recoup a very small share of those investments with this campaign!
     
  • 2200€ quality mastering 
    Again we place our trust in the wonderful people at Fascination Street Studios who did an awesome job for TIME TEARS DOWN.
     
  • 1500 € video production
    Shooting a music video and creating lyric videos is expensive but almost obligatory.
    Help us out!
     
  • 700 € print and promotion
    Releasing a new album requires a lot of small marketing investments from simple flyers to advertisement in magazines and backdrops for the stage for example.
     
  •  600 € funding fees 
    ...for the campaign goal and the exchange fee.

In addition we seek for your support to be able to fullfill many of the requests you sent us over the last years. Requests like "come to my (name of your country here)", "release vinyls", "make hoodies" or "where's the new music?". Requests like these unfortunately almost always require one thing: Financial power. So here's the chance for all of us to see how far we can come with the funding and set these things into a more realistic light.
 

THE PERKS IN DETAIL

Crowdfunding always is giving and taking! So what are you going to get back for your support? Find it out here:  

  • THE DOWNLOAD This is the basic package and is included in all perks! Get our new album DEAD AND ALIVE as a digital download and a media package with digital booklet, 4k wallpapers, tabulatures and access to exclusive vlogs. 



     
  • THE LIMITED ALBUM The classic CD - Exclusively for the funding, all CDs come with a limited and handnumbered slipcase and stickers. It won't be available anymore with the official preorder or when the album is officially released.



     
  • THE LIMITED SHIRT This is just the shirt (but of course also including THE DOWNLOAD). The shirt will be a funding exclusive design...and all evidence is going to be destroyed after ;)



     
  • SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY! Well, it is what it says. Get THE DOWNLOAD but we appreciate the extra bucks with your name in the CD and digital booklet.



     
  • THE BUNDLE The allrounder. Get THE DOWNLOAD,  THE LIMITED ALBUM and THE LIMITED SHIRT. 



     
  • THE EXTENDED BUNDLE It's basically the bundle but the band will autograph your copy of DEAD AND ALIVE  and add a personal message on an autograph card (we will be creative ;) ).  Also, we appreciate the extra bucks with your name in the CD and digital booklet.



     
  • THE COLLECTORS EDITION will contain just everything what is available in the campaign (except for the hire kai perk and complete edition) + a signed copy of DEAD AND ALIVE and TIME TEARS DOWN + we go back to our old school days and deliver you a hand made and hand numbered special CD  named UNRELEASHED. For the CD we checked our archives to unearth some unreleased and very rare demos of our songs. 



     
  • THE COMPLETE EDITION is an extened version of THE COLLECTORS EDITION and limited irrevocably to 7! You will get one of the last(!) remaining physical copies of our 2010 debut PARASITE INC. The copies once went to Japan and after over 8 years and a 16.000 km journey, we were finally able to bring them back to Germany... just to extend their journey into your hands! 

    Also you will get one of the last copies of the rare 'Local Underground Sampler II'. The sampler contains the demo of the song 'Pulse of the Dead' and was released back in early 2012 right before we started with the recordings to TIME TEARS DOWN. At that time we contributed to the sampler alongside other local metal bands and friends to support the local metal scene around our hometown Aalen. 

    And last but not least we will add our guitar picks, signed drum sticks, poster and a PARASITE INC. patch to make this package worth its name.



     
  • HIRE KAI -  Do you have a band? Want him to do some crime on your songs? Here's your chance to get his flowery voice on your track or let him break his fingers to your song with a guitar solo! 

 

IMPORTANT INFORMATION 

Please read these informations carefully. If you have any questions anyway, just shoot us a direct mail or write us to info@parasiteinc.de.

PAYMENT METHODS

  • PAYPAL: Indiegogo officially discontinued PAYPAL as payment option. However we can offer you PAYPAL outside of Indiegogo: www.parasiteinc.de/krautfunding
     
  • WIRE TRANSFER:  We offer bank transfer. Please send us a mail to info@parasiteinc.de with your addres, name of the perk and if required the shirt size / name in booklet option.

     
IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR THE "YOUR NAME IN THE BOOKLET" OPTION


We offer this option because we think this is a cool way to remember you as one of the persons who actively helped us to make this album become real. However, if you want a perk but don't feel comfy with the mentioning in the booklet you can simply disable it after you decided for the perk. Keep in mind: Once the campaign ended there is no way we can ever remove you from the booklet... You are f'ing immortal!
 

RELEASE AND DELIVERY SCHEDULE

  • The funding will end on Sunday, June 10th. 
  • All physical orders will be shipped 1.5 weeks before the official release on August 17th.
    (Due to the distances and customs we can't promise an arrival right in time to the "inofficial" release on August 10th.)
  • However all supporters will receive a link via e-mail with the download package on August 10th.
     

SHIPPING

  • For the smaller perks there will be a shipping fee of 3 € (Germany) and 5 € (rest of the world).
  • For the higher priced perks above 50 € we require larger packaging and safety. Shipping for these perks will cost 5 € (Germany) and 10 € (rest of the world). Higher priced perks also come with a tracking ID. 
     

SHIRT INFORMATION

As usual we will go with Gildan Premium Cotton shirts. In our long time experience these shirts always did a good job. If you feel not sure about which size you may require, grab a shirt that fits, a folding ruler and compare it with the chart below: 


(sorry guys for the cm, for inch just divide by 2.54)

So here's the chance for all of us to see how far we can come with the funding and set these things into a more realistic light.  
THE PERKS IN DETAILCrowdfunding always is giving and taking! So what are you going to get back for your support? Find it out here:  

THE DOWNLOAD This is the basic package and is included in all perks! Get our new album DEAD AND ALIVE as a digital download and a media package with digital booklet, 4k wallpapers, tabulatures and access to exclusive vlogs.  

THE LIMITED ALBUM The classic CD - Exclusively for the funding, all CDs come with a limited and handnumbered slipcase and stickers. It won't be available anymore with the official preorder or when the album is officially released. 

THE LIMITED SHIRT This is just the shirt (but of course also including THE DOWNLOAD). The shirt will be a funding exclusive design...and all evidence is going to be destroyed after ;) 

SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY! Well, it is what it says. Get THE DOWNLOAD but we appreciate the extra bucks with your name in the CD and digital booklet. 

THE BUNDLE The allrounder. Get THE DOWNLOAD,  THE LIMITED ALBUM and THE LIMITED SHIRT.  

THE EXTENDED BUNDLE It's basically the bundle but the band will autograph your copy of DEAD AND ALIVE  and add a personal message on an autograph card (we will be creative ;) ).  Also, we appreciate the extra bucks with your name in the CD and digital booklet. 

THE COLLECTORS EDITION will contain just everything what is available in the campaign (except for the hire kai perk and complete edition) + a signed copy of DEAD AND ALIVE and TIME TEARS DOWN + we go back to our old school days and deliver you a hand made and hand numbered special CD  named UNRELEASHED. For the CD we checked our archives to unearth some unreleased and very rare demos of our songs.  

THE COMPLETE EDITION is an extened version of THE COLLECTORS EDITION and limited irrevocably to 7! You will get one of the last(!) remaining physical copies of our 2010 debut PARASITE INC. The copies once went to Japan and after over 8 years and a 16.000 km journey, we were finally able to bring them back to Germany... just to extend their journey into your hands! Also you will get one of the last copies of the rare 'Local Underground Sampler II'. The sampler contains the demo of the song 'Pulse of the Dead' and was released back in early 2012 right before we started with the recordings to TIME TEARS DOWN. At that time we contributed to the sampler alongside other local metal bands and friends to support the local metal scene around our hometown Aalen. And last but not least we will add our guitar picks, signed drum sticks, poster and a PARASITE INC. patch to make this package worth its name. 

HIRE KAI -  Do you have a band? Want him to do some crime on your songs? Here's your chance to get his flowery voice on your track or let him break his fingers to your song with a guitar solo! 


 
IMPORTANT INFORMATION 
Please read these informations carefully. If you have any questions anyway, just shoot us a direct mail or write us to info@parasiteinc.de.PAYMENT METHODS


PAYPAL: Indiegogo officially discontinued PAYPAL as payment option. However we can offer you PAYPAL outside of Indiegogo: www.parasiteinc.de/krautfunding 

WIRE TRANSFER:  We offer bank transfer. Please send us a mail to info@parasiteinc.de with your addres, name of the perk and if required the shirt size / name in booklet option. 

IMPORTANT INFORMATION FOR THE "YOUR NAME IN THE BOOKLET" OPTION
We offer this option because we think this is a cool way to remember you as one of the persons who actively helped us to make this album become real. However, if you want a perk but don't feel comfy with the mentioning in the booklet you can simply disable it after you decided for the perk. Keep in mind: Once the campaign ended there is no way we can ever remove you from the booklet... You are f'ing immortal! RELEASE AND DELIVERY SCHEDULE
The funding will end on Sunday, June 10th. 
All physical orders will be shipped 1.5 weeks before the official release on August 17th.(Due to the distances and customs we can't promise an arrival right in time to the "inofficial" release on August 10th.)
However all supporters will receive a link via e-mail with the download package on August 10th. 
SHIPPING
For the smaller perks there will be a shipping fee of 3 € (Germany) and 5 € (rest of the world).
For the higher priced perks above 50 € we require larger packaging and safety. Shipping for these perks will cost 5 € (Germany) and 10 € (rest of the world). Higher priced perks also come with a tracking ID.  
SHIRT INFORMATIONAs usual we will go with Gildan Premium Cotton shirts. In our long time experience these shirts always did a good job. If you feel not sure about which size you may require, grab a shirt that fits, a folding ruler and compare it with the chart below: (sorry guys for the cm, for inch just divide by 2.54)

story:
Independent volunteers in Skala Sikamineas, Lesvos, Greece, are gathering funds to purchase a qanun, a musical instrument used in the Middle East and Central Asia, for entertainment and art therapy for arriving refugees and migrants.  Funds will go directly to the purchase of the qanun, which will be used by musicians on the island as well as arriving refugees.

The instrument will be purchased by musician Vassiliki Papageorgiou in Turkey and brought to Lesvos.  You can read more about Vassiliki's work at https://www.facebook.com/vassiliki.papageorgiou.3.

We thank you for your solidarity with refugees and migrants.

story:
We are Nicolas and the Saints, and we need your help

I, Nick, Nicolas, have lived in Brighton for 11 years. Spent my entire adult life here. But now I'm leaving. And I've written an album to say goodbye to the place. A record that starts with a lament, a raw account of heartbreak a year from the end of a seven year relationship with the love of my life, and ends with a bittersweet farewell to the hipster fishing village I've called home for over a decade.

I, Nick, Nicolas, started Nicolas and the Saints as a solo electronic project. But now it's grown to a five-piece live band. And as a five-piece live band, we want to make a record the old-fashioned way. Two days in a high-end London studio with a hotshot young producer. Everything played live. No electronic trickery bar the odd guitar pedal.

We, Nicolas and the Saints, have rehearsed the living hell out of it. Played it live and worked out the kinks. Put together an album that veers between unhinged jazz-rap, existential blues and traditional bar ballads. That traces my, Nick, Nicolas' last year of my twenties, coloured with electric guitar, upright bass, saxophone, drums and vocals. 

It will sound a bit like, but much nicer than, this live performance we did at The Good Ship in London:

http://livamp.com/performances/nicolasandsaints-goodship/

But making records the old-fashioned way is expensive. Without your help, we can't make it.

The band

I, Nick, Nicolas, am blessed to have put together a band of musicians all better than me. It's everything a songwriter could hope for. Let me introduce them.

Chris Evans-Roberts (sax) is one of the top 3 mash-up artists in the world, internet famous for his company Ithaca Audio's work. And he plays sax in Brighton funk legends - Craig Charles favourites and big in Germany - The Impellers.

Roxanne De Barr (backing vocals) is an old friend who has lent me her lady pipes on many projects over the years. She's got a stunning tone and a great ear for counter-melodies and hooks.

Scott Gentry (upright bass) is a professional session player. He can play anything. He's helped me make space in my arrangements, and add nuance to my hungover chord progressions. And he translates my vague instructions into session speak for Ryan, the drummer, to understand.

Ryan Akehurst (drums) is a drum prodigy. Barely 21 years old he's easily the best drummer I've ever worked with. Often on sessions with Scott, he's only just finishing his drum degree but his playing has a breadth and depth that's rare in a tub-thumper.

What we need and what you get

We need £1,500 to pay for the studio and the producer.

If we raise more, we will use the extra to press vinyl.

You will receive a digital copy of the album as soon as it's finished. Think of it as a pre-order. It's just for something that hasn't been made yet.

You will also receive a digital copy of my, Nick, Nicolas' solo album - Years in the Making, a seven year labour of love - before its general release.

It's buy one get one free on Nicolas and the Saints records. Here's one of the songs you'll get:


Splash a bit more cash and get a thank you on the digital liner notes. Another tenner gets you a personalised print of the artwork in the post, complete with thank you note from the band and everyone's signature.

For the ultimate experience, come join us in the studio and watch the action unfold.

The impact

Why make anything? Hopefully you'll enjoy listening to it. Hopefully it will make the world a little bit nicer. Hopefully it will be judged to have some artistic merit.

Maybe you'll learn something about yourself. Isn't that what art is for? For giving a window into someone else's perspective so that you might better understand your own?

Maybe it'll just sound good.

It will definitely sound good.

We plan on recording at Livingston Studios, an ultra-high-end facility in London. Our producer, Chris Myatt, has made beautiful sounding records for some of Brighton's best singer-songwriter and folk acts: Common Tongues, Elin Ivarsson, Ellie Ford. I, Nick, Nicolas, am a working mastering engineer and will be mastering it. I have worked on some of Brighton's best singer-songwriters' records: Matthew the Oxx, Jack Watts, Oktoba.

Risks and challenges

Two days recording is very conservative by today's standards.

But half the band are session musicians. The other half have been playing for nearly 20 years each. We are well rehearsed, we know what we're doing. The Beatles made records in less. Back when records were good.

Other ways you can help

Please tell your friends. Please tell anyone you think will enjoy the album. If you've seen us live, you'll have a good idea of what we're about.

Share this campaign on your Facebook, Twitter. Write about it on your blog. Tell your friends down the pub. Please just help us make this record. We just want to make something beautiful.

story:
Hello! My name is Maren. I started out at an early age of 11 performing for talent shows in school. I would often do solo performances for my church and weddings as well. I accompanied myself with a guitar and often I would have someone accompany me on the piano. In my early 20's I had all the attributes of a light opera singer. I received no prior training. In my late 20's I became more involved with singing in bands during the 80's Punk & New Wave scene, however, like many of us life happened and I soon lost that zest for creativity. I had a very difficult life & difficulty maintaining a menial job due to my vision impairment in which I am now receiving assistance for my basic living needs. In 2011 it occurred to me that I was once upon a time a talented singer & lyricist so I decided to go back to my roots with writing & singing. I am now a viral success as I have been involved in the music industry since 2011 and doing well, however, I work with 2 primary artists who happened to both reside in the U.K. and both artists have asked me to fly to London to do a series of shows with them in the U.K. I am on a fixed income therefore I need funding for the trip to and back to the U.S. I truly believe that this trip will make or break what I've been doing with music over the internet with these very talented European instrumental composers over the last 5 years. The first artist I work with is Nature Of Wires who back in the 80's & early 90's did a great deal of production & live shows so this artist is established quite notably and the second artist runs a quite large number in his band called Real Experts who have been performing & producing since the 80's. Both bands are in the genre of Future & Synthpop with a touch of Electro & EBM. Your generous contribution to my campaign will enable me to not only have the opportunity to branch out but it will allow the first artist (Nature Of Wires) & CountessM to launch the release of our forthcoming album entitled "Cyber Rendezvous" more effectively and at a much quicker pace. As for Real Experts & CountessM your contribution will allow our forthcoming single to also have a quick launch.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
About Marystown


We are Marystown. We are a Country-Folk band based in Edmonton Alberta, Canada. Over the last couple years of playing together, we have  made some great music, had some amazing times and played for thousands of Canadians fans.

PREVIEW OUR EP HERE:    http://www.marystown.band/



In 2014 and 2015 we released some music that has was well received from our fans in North America and overseas. 

When our song "Girl I Love You So" landed at #1 on a Country Music Chart in the UK,  a group from Sweden invited Marystown on a 16-day tour of their country this November.

It is our dream to take our Live performance to Europe and if this dream is going to become a reality, we are going to need from help Friends, Family and most importantly, our Fans. 


The Meat & Potatoes (Perks)


$5 - "THE PERFECT REALITY" (digital)
Receive one digital download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP + A personal thank you from the band

$10 - HELLO FROM SWEDEN!
Personalized Thank you Postcard from Sweden signed by the band + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP

$15 -

"THE PERFECT REALITY" + Patch

Receive one Hard Copy of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP + One authentic Marystown Patch + A personal thank you from the band

$25 - GEARING UP
Receive One Marystown T-shirt + One Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP

                                 


$30 - THE DRUMMER
Get 1 of 100 Limited Edition "RAWLO DRUMS" T-Shirt + One Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP

         


$50 - COLLECTORS PACK
You will receive one Autographed Hard Copy CD of "THE PERFECT REALITY EP" + one Marystown T-Shirt + Marystown Patch + Digital Download  of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP

$50 - STAY WARM!
Receive One Marystown Hoodie + One Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP

                         


$100 - COME WRITE WITH US!
2+ hour Song Writing Session with Marystown + writing credits on the next album + Marystown T-Shirt + Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP 

$150 - HEATHER BOUCHIER DRESS
ONE Heather Bouchier custom designed dress made to fit your size + One Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP (After your purchase is made, you will be contacted to go over custom design and fitting)

                        

                             

Heather Bouchier is a Plains Cree designer from the Beardy's & Okemasis Cree Nation in Saskatchewan but is based in Edmonton, Alberta. She has spent the last few years promoting her clothing at National Aboriginal Fashion Week, Aboriginal Day celebrations, and has shown as an emerging designer at Western Canadian Fashion Week. Heather's style and focus has been on re-using and upcycling fabrics to create new youthful pieces with touches of vintage flair.


$250 - "DOLPHIN" SUPERFAN 
Lifetime Guestlist For Marystown Concerts + Marystown Hoodie + Limited Rawlo T-Shirt + Marystown T-Shirt + Autographed Hard Copy CD + Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP + Personalized Thank you Postcard from Sweden signed by the band. 

$500 - ACOUSTIC CONCERT
Band leader Evan Murray and company will play an acoustic concert at a private location of your choice for you and up to 25 guests. Live Photo/Video Included. 

$750 - "WHALE" SUPERFAN 
Autographed Fender Sonoran Acoustic Guitar seen in the Music Video "Anything For You" + Lifetime Guestlist For Marystown Concerts + Marystown Hoodie + Limited Rawlo T-Shirt + Marystown T-Shirt + Autographed Hard Copy CD + Digital ALBUM Download + Personalized Thank you Postcard from Sweden signed by the band. 


$1000 - THE AGENT

FOR VENUES & PROMOTERS. Book the full Marystown band for a show at your Venue, Event, or Festival. Typical shows are 90-120 minutes and can be broken up into two or three sets. 

*Sound/Stage/Lighting and production not included


$1500 - FULL BLOWN MARYSTOWN HOUSE CONCERT 
We bring the band, the sound equipment, the lights, and the gear. You decide where the show is and bring whoever you want!! Live Photo/Video Included. Must be in Western Canada unless additional travel arrangements are made

$4000 - THE TOUR MANAGER
Do it

The Impact


This tour is going to bring our music to life overseas, but this is just the beginning. While we are over there, we already have meetings set up with large festival organizers and promoters from all over Europe about playing the major summer festival circuit in 2016. When we return from this trip, we are going full steam ahead with recording our next album and preparing for our 2016 summer tour.

Your support will help us to manage this tour effectively and return home without a huge pile of debt. This will allow us to focus on recording and releasing more music as soon as possible. 


Risks & Challenges


Shipping products can take time and shipping across borders can make things more difficult. We will do our absolute best to have all of our perks delivered on time, and if there is any delays, we will keep you in the loop.


Any support is good support!


As full time musicians, we completely understand when the going gets tough. We really appreciate that you took the time to explore our campaign and we hope you have enjoyed it. If you are not able to support financially here are a few other ways you can help:

  • Refer this campaign to friends and family that might be interested in our music or in supporting our band!
  • Use the tools provided by Indiegogo to Share this campaign to Facebook, Twitter and by Email!

Stay tuned and check back for new and exciting perks over the next few weeks!

She has spent the last few years promoting her clothing at National Aboriginal Fashion Week, Aboriginal Day celebrations, and has shown as an emerging designer at Western Canadian Fashion Week. Heather's style and focus has been on re-using and upcycling fabrics to create new youthful pieces with touches of vintage flair.


$250 - "DOLPHIN" SUPERFAN 
Lifetime Guestlist For Marystown Concerts + Marystown Hoodie + Limited Rawlo T-Shirt + Marystown T-Shirt + Autographed Hard Copy CD + Marystown Patch + Digital Download of "THE PERFECT REALITY" 6 song EP + Personalized Thank you Postcard from Sweden signed by the band. 

$500 - ACOUSTIC CONCERT
Band leader Evan Murray and company will play an acoustic concert at a private location of your choice for you and up to 25 guests. Live Photo/Video Included. 


$750 - "WHALE" SUPERFAN 

Autographed Fender Sonoran Acoustic Guitar seen in the Music Video "Anything For You" + Lifetime Guestlist For Marystown Concerts + Marystown Hoodie + Limited Rawlo T-Shirt + Marystown T-Shirt + Autographed Hard Copy CD + Digital ALBUM Download + Personalized Thank you Postcard from Sweden signed by the band. 





$1000 - THE AGENT


FOR VENUES & PROMOTERS. Book the full Marystown band for a show at your Venue, Event, or Festival. Typical shows are 90-120 minutes and can be broken up into two or three sets. 
*Sound/Stage/Lighting and production not included



$1500 - FULL BLOWN MARYSTOWN HOUSE CONCERT 
We bring the band, the sound equipment, the lights, and the gear. You decide where the show is and bring whoever you want!! Live Photo/Video Included. Must be in Western Canada unless additional travel arrangements are made


$4000 - THE TOUR MANAGER
Do it
   The Impact
 This tour is going to bring our music to life overseas, but this is just the beginning. While we are over there, we already have meetings set up with large festival organizers and promoters from all over Europe about playing the major summer festival circuit in 2016. When we return from this trip, we are going full steam ahead with recording our next album and preparing for our 2016 summer tour.
Your support will help us to manage this tour effectively and return home without a huge pile of debt. This will allow us to focus on recording and releasing more music as soon as possible. 
   Risks & Challenges
 Shipping products can take time and shipping across borders can make things more difficult. We will do our absolute best to have all of our perks delivered on time, and if there is any delays, we will keep you in the loop.
   Any support is good support!
 As full time musicians, we completely understand when the going gets tough. We really appreciate that you took the time to explore our campaign and we hope you have enjoyed it. If you are not able to support financially here are a few other ways you can help:  Refer this campaign to friends and family that might be interested in our music or in supporting our band!
Use the tools provided by Indiegogo to Share this campaign to Facebook, Twitter and by Email!   Stay tuned and check back for new and exciting perks over the next few weeks!

story:
I directed the film, The Dicks From Texas and am a longtime Austin music lover. There are tons of shows which use Austin as a backdrop, but rarely feature the fabulous talent that makes Austin 'the music capital of the world.'

This effort is to raise the necessary funds to shoot a pilot episode of a 30-minute music television show which will feature the local talent which really gives Austin, Texas its reputation...the best music you NEVER heard!

When I was shooting 'The Dicks From Texas' many artists who loved this band stepped forward to cover a Dicks song. I was blown away by not only the love these artists had for the Dicks and Austin's music scene, but also by the incredible talent in our town.

The world has no idea what is going on every night at local live music venues where these great bands and artists play to packed houses filled with hardcore music lovers.

This show plans to share this treasure trove of music with the rest of the world and we need your help to do it!

We estimate the pilot to cost about $20K and are using this crowdfunding effort to raise the money. If you have a dollar, chip it in and be a part of this dream.  If you don't have an extra dollar, share this funder and help us make this happen.
